about_the_game:
In Ship Upgrades DLC a host of new upgrades are available for the player ship! This DLC not only adds the upgrades but also entirely new game features come along with them!







• A host of 10 new ship exclusive upgrades and modules ranging from planetary bombardment cannon and quad fuel tanks, to carrier modules. Buy a Heavy Carrier module and practically convert your explorer ship into a solid carrier by housing 6 fighters to launch and attack enemy ships!



• New game features include ship crew morale and the ability to call your ship in orbit to fire bombardment cannon to the selected location on a planet surface!

• Watch out, the lower the crew morale gets the more of a chance for them to resign when arriving at space stations or outposts.

• Boost morale by holding speeches, throwing parties and hosting banquets. Further increase the effects of these events with ship upgrade modules such as a conference hall, night club or restaurant.

• New Theaters on stations and outposts maybe abstract but very functional and can give free positive morale tokens just when your leader visits one. Watch out sometimes the movie may not be good in which case a negative morale token maybe received.

• New Restaurants on stations and outposts can give free positive morale and food & water tokens just when your leader visits one. Watch out sometimes the food or service may not be good in which case a negative morale token maybe received.

• New ASM's item which are anti-ship missiles specifically used to attack capital ships. These can be found, bought at manufacturers, used by ASM launcher or sold.
